name: Bounty Hunter Survival
description:
Survival shmup game! 

Fullscreen NOT recommended!

Controls:

  • Movement -> WASD
  • Shooting -> Mouse Click or CTRL
  • Pause -> ESC

[x] Explosions in space

[x] Laser

[x] Power ups

[x] Fun

github link: https://github.com/thiagoverardo/JogosDigitais (all references and codes)
